members.description: Search weather stations information by country or geo information.
members.name: station_list

params.description:
The country to search for. For example: US. Refer to ftp://ftp.ncdc.noaa.gov/pub/data/noaa/country-list.txt
 (required)
params.name: country

The country to search for. For example: US. Refer to ftp://ftp.ncdc.noaa.gov/pub/data/noaa/country-list.txt
 (required)
params.name: country

params.name: end_dt

params.description:
The optional,
'd': daily summary of weather (default),
'w': weekly summary of weather, 
'm': monthly summary of weather

params.name: fields
